title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.141 - Pushcart handwashing facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.141 - Pushcart handwashing facilities

State Regulations

Pushcarts are to have handwashing facilities for the operator. This handwashing facility is to be a supply of clean, potable water, soap or detergent, a receptacle to hold waste water and paper towels. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-4.141

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
